name: Rope 2021
description:
A game about being a robot with a rope under the rain. Currently experimenting with the art style.
Created by Eduardo Rizzo and Giovani Hirochi

Keyboard and Mouse:

WASD - Move

Left Mouse Button - Use/Hold Rope

Scroll Mouse - Zoom In/Out

Xbox Controller:

Left Analogue Stick - Move and Aim

RB - Use/Hold Rope

Known Issues:

- If a Usb controller is connected, aim does not work correctly. Be kind to me.
